attributes.action: End workplace discrimination against tattooed/pierced employee's
attributes.additional_details:
For years now, people with tattoos and piercings have had to suffer the stereotypes placed upon them from a bygone era.

We, the undersigned want the Goverment to recognise that treating someone in the workplace this way is a form of descrimination.

Today its more rare to meet someone without a tattoo or piercing and yet we have to shy away at work as though we have something to be ashamed of.
